languages.text: {n}Кибелла оказывается за вашей спиной и провожает взглядом Мертвеца.{/n} "Человек отсекал от тел души тех, кому еще не было пора. Не потому что чтил смерть, а потому что любил убивать. Человек не имеет права на подобное. Никто не имеет".

{n}Kibellah appears behind you and watches the man leave.{/n} "He severed souls from bodies before their fated time. Not because he honoured death, but because he enjoyed killing. He did not have that right. No one does."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла оказывается за вашей спиной и провожает взглядом Мертвеца.{/n} "Человек отсекал от тел души тех, кому еще не было пора. Не потому что чтил смерть, а потому что любил убивать. Человек не имеет права на подобное. Никто не имеет".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah apparaît soudain derrière vous et regarde attentivement l'homme s'éloigner.{/n} « Il a séparé des âmes de leur corps alors même que leur heure n'était pas encore venue. Non pas parce qu'il honorait la mort, mais parce qu'il en tirait du plaisir. Il n'en avait pas le droit. Nul n'en a le droit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah appears behind you and watches the man leave.{/n} "He severed souls from bodies before their fated time. Not because he honoured death, but because he enjoyed killing. He did not have that right. No one does."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah apparaît soudain derrière vous et regarde attentivement l'homme s'éloigner.{/n} « Il a séparé des âmes de leur corps alors même que leur heure n'était pas encore venue. Non pas parce qu'il honorait la mort, mais parce qu'il en tirait du plaisir. Il n'en avait pas le droit. Nul n'en a le droit. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se sitúa detrás de ti y observa al hombre marcharse.{/n} «Segó almas de sus cuerpos antes de que les hubiese llegado la hora. Y no porque honrase la muerte, sino porque disfrutaba matando. No tenía derecho. Nadie lo tiene».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah appears behind you and watches the man leave.{/n} "He severed souls from bodies before their fated time. Not because he honoured death, but because he enjoyed killing. He did not have that right. No one does."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah se sitúa detrás de ti y observa al hombre marcharse.{/n} «Segó almas de sus cuerpos antes de que les hubiese llegado la hora. Y no porque honrase la muerte, sino porque disfrutaba matando. No tenía derecho. Nadie lo tiene».

languages.text: {n}キベラが背後から現れて、立ち去る男を見送った。{/n}「彼は運命の時が来る前に肉体から魂を切り離したのよ。死を尊ばず、殺人に悦びを感じたせいね。喜んで人を殺す権利は彼にはない。誰にもないのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah appears behind you and watches the man leave.{/n} "He severed souls from bodies before their fated time. Not because he honoured death, but because he enjoyed killing. He did not have that right. No one does."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラが背後から現れて、立ち去る男を見送った。{/n}「彼は運命の時が来る前に肉体から魂を切り離したのよ。死を尊ばず、殺人に悦びを感じたせいね。喜んで人を殺す権利は彼にはない。誰にもないのよ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈出现在你身后，目送着那个人离开。{/n}“这个人在人们的大限到来之前，就割断了那些人的丝线。他这么做不是因为他尊重死亡，而是因为他享受杀戮。他没有权利这么做，没人有权利这么做。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah appears behind you and watches the man leave.{/n} "He severed souls from bodies before their fated time. Not because he honoured death, but because he enjoyed killing. He did not have that right. No one does."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈出现在你身后，目送着那个人离开。{/n}“这个人在人们的大限到来之前，就割断了那些人的丝线。他这么做不是因为他尊重死亡，而是因为他享受杀戮。他没有权利这么做，没人有权利这么做。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah erscheint hinter dir und sieht zu, wie der Mann geht.{/n} "Er hat Seelen von ihrem Körper getrennt, bevor ihre vom Schicksal bestimmte Zeit abgelaufen war. Nicht weil er den Tod ehrte, sondern weil das Töten ihm Freude bereitete. Er hatte nicht das Recht dazu. Niemand hat das."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah appears behind you and watches the man leave.{/n} "He severed souls from bodies before their fated time. Not because he honoured death, but because he enjoyed killing. He did not have that right. No one does."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah erscheint hinter dir und sieht zu, wie der Mann geht.{/n} "Er hat Seelen von ihrem Körper getrennt, bevor ihre vom Schicksal bestimmte Zeit abgelaufen war. Nicht weil er den Tod ehrte, sondern weil das Töten ihm Freude bereitete. Er hatte nicht das Recht dazu. Niemand hat das."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, arkanda belirip adamın gidişini izliyor.{/n} "Ecelleri gelmeden ruhları bedenlerinden ayırıyordu. Ölüme saygısından değil, öldürmekten zevk aldığından. Buna hakkı yoktu. Kimsenin yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah appears behind you and watches the man leave.{/n} "He severed souls from bodies before their fated time. Not because he honoured death, but because he enjoyed killing. He did not have that right. No one does."
